description: This file defines theme-related classes for a Flutter application, including color constants (AppColors) and a theme configuration (AppTheme) with a method to generate a customized ThemeData object called oceanProfessional.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: A utility class containing static constants for frequently used colors in the theme.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class that provides a method to generate a customized ThemeData object for the application, specifically the oceanProfessional theme.

methods.name: oceanProfessional
methods.description: A getter that constructs and returns a ThemeData object configured with the Ocean Professional theme colors, including customized app bar, card, input decoration, button, and chip styles.
